interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Veta – Lash and Eyebrow Serum – 2-in-1 Lash & Brow Pen – Produces Longer, Healthier, Denser Lashes and Thicker Brows – Eyelash Serum – Boosts Skin Collagen – Drug-Free Formula - 1 fl oz.
Review Date: 2020/01/18
Store: Veta
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Color': 'Silver, Black', 'Brand': 'Veta', 'Item Form': 'lotion', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.2 x 1.61 x 1.57 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '861121002645'}
Review Text: First off, all these new lash growth serums seem to work if you use them consistently, as does this one by Veta. However, I was not impressed with the container and/or applicator. It’s a small tube similar to a thin mascara bottle and it has a black button on top to release the serum. The tip is like a thick wax that gets covered with the serum but it’s difficult to use on the subtle lash line or eyes in general. I prefer the wand versions to apply the serum because they are simple and fast and easier to apply. This lash and brow pen does work though and only takes about two weeks to see a difference.
Review Title: Works With Time And Patience
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Veta – Lash and Eyebrow Serum – 2-in-1 Lash & Brow Pen – Produces Longer, Healthier, Denser Lashes and Thicker Brows – Eyelash Serum – Boosts Skin Collagen – Drug-Free Formula - 1 fl oz.
Veta
{'Color': 'Silver, Black', 'Brand': 'Veta', 'Item Form': 'lotion', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.2 x 1.61 x 1.57 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '861121002645'}
First off, all these new lash growth serums seem to work if you use them consistently, as does this one by Veta. However, I was not impressed with the container and/or applicator. It’s a small tube similar to a thin mascara bottle and it has a black button on top to release the serum. The tip is like a thick wax that gets covered with the serum but it’s difficult to use on the subtle lash line or eyes in general. I prefer the wand versions to apply the serum because they are simple and fast and easier to apply. This lash and brow pen does work though and only takes about two weeks to see a difference.
Works With Time And Patience
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Preference for Efficacy:** Values products that demonstrate effectiveness over time, especially in beauty and grooming categories such as lash and brow enhancements.
  
- **Application Method:** Shows a clear preference for user-friendly applicators. Favors wand applicators for their ease and speed of use over more complex designs.

- **Experience with Products:** Open to trying different brands and formulations, but expresses dissatisfaction with product packaging or application methods when they hinder usability.

- **Realistic Expectations:** Understands that consistent use is essential for achieving desired results and appears patient in the pursuit of efficacy.

- **Product Ratings:** Tends to rate products based on a combination of functionality and user experience, indicating a balanced consideration of both performance and convenience. 

This user likely engages regularly in purchasing beauty products that enhance appearance, focusing on practicality and effective results.
